name: Fanfic Inspired I Was Sold To One Direction
name_original: Fanfic Inspired I Was Sold To One Direction
description:
Pick your own name! or don't... 

Uh Oh.... You've been sold! But your new owners are! One Direction!

Make choices! Meet strange but familiar characters, and most importantly... go on a date with HARRY STYLES! 

This is my first ever renpy game, made in 3 days. Enjoy the memes.

Images and sounds you hear are not my own and mostly just stock images found online.
